purpleculture_pinyin:
xiè
variant of 泄 [xie4]
вариант утечки [xie4]
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 曳 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
洩漏 [ xiè lòu ]: variant of 泄露 [xie4 lou4]
洩露 [ xiè lòu ]: variant of 泄露 [xie4 lou4]
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 曳 [ yè ] to tow, to pull, to drag
heisig_chinese_memo: The old clanky tow truck that no one likes to see is always dischargeing fluid because the lazy driver won't fix it (then the company will give him a new truck!).
Ru_Notes: С таким кандзи 洩らす [もらす] в основном используется с оттенками "выболтать, проговориться", "упустить из виду".
Ru_Words:
洩れもれ
  • утечка, просачивание
  • пропуск, пробел, недосмотр
    • 洩らすもらす
  • дать просочиться, дать вытечь
  • проявить, выразить, дать выход чувствам
  • выболтать, выдать (секрет, тайну)
    • 漏洩ろうえい
  • утечка
  • разглашение
    • 言い洩らすいいもらす
  • разглашать, проговариваться, выбалтывать
  • забывать сказать, упускать
    • warodai
    討ち洩らすうちもらす
  • упускать (противника), давать скрыться
    • warodai
    調定洩れちょうていもれ
  • упущение (недосмотр) в соглашении
    • warodai
Ru_Radicals: ノ, 乙 (второй), 汁 (суп), 日 (день)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the water (氵) you pull (曳) leaks
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Old people always complain that the amount of tears (water) discharged from the young generation is much higher than from the older generation because they young ones are not as tough.

Chinese: The old clanky tow truck that no one likes to see is always dischargeing fluid because the lazy driver won't fix it (then the company will give him a new truck!).
Meaning: discharge
Hanzi: 泄
Story: Old people always complain that the amount of tears (water) discharged from the young generation is much higher than from the older generation because they young ones are not as tough.
Kind: traditional

洩字的基本解释

洩
xiè
同“泄1”。

洩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiè］
［《集韻》私列切，入薛，心。］
同“泄1”。
(1)漏；泄漏。
(2)排泄；倾泻。
(3)减少。
(4)发泄。
(5)散，发散；排除。
(6)停歇。
(7)方言。瀑布。
(8)姓。春秋郑有洩氏。见《左传·僖公七年》。
[②]［yì］
［《廣韻》餘制切，去祭，以。］
见“洩2洩”。

洩字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　洩； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页621第20
【廣韻】餘制切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】以制切，?音曳。舒散也。【左傳·隱元年】其樂也洩洩。　又飛翔貌。【木華·海賦】翔霧連軒淫淫洩洩。　又順風貌。【木華·海賦】或掣掣洩洩于裸人之國。　又【廣韻】【集韻】私列切【正韻】先結切，?音薛。【揚子·方言】洩，歇也。【左思·東都賦】馬踠餘足，士怒未洩。　又漏也。【中庸】振河海而不洩。　又除去也。亦作渫，詳渫字註。　又減也。【左傳·昭二十年】濟其不足，以洩其過。　又谿名。【水經注】諸曁縣洩谿。　又姓。【左傳·僖七年】鄭有洩氏。　【玉篇】同泄。

洩字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
洩字的起名意思

牵牲口的绳子或缚罪人的绳索；捆绑。

Basic explanation of words
vent
xiè
Same as "vent 1".
vent
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiè］
["Jiyun" private column cut, enter Xue, heart. ]
Same as "vent 1".
(1) Leak; Leak.
(2) Excretion; dumping.
(3) Decrease.
(4) Vent.
(5) Disperse, diverge; exclude.
(6) Stopping.
(7) Dialects. waterfall.
(8) Last name. Chun Qiu Zheng Youxie's family. See "Zuo Zhuan·Seven Years of Gong Xi".
[②]［yì］
["Guangyun" more than cut, go to sacrifice, to. ]
See "Ejaculation 2 Ejaculation".
vent
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Zi Department] 　 Xie; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: Page 621 No. 20
[Guang Yun] Yu-Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun] to make the cut,? Tone drag. Shu San also. [Zuo Zhuan·Yin First Year] The joy is also vented.　Flying appearance again. 【Muhua·Haifu】Xiangwu Lianxuan is lewd and lewd.　Smooth style again. [Muhua·Haifu] or vent in the country of naked people.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] private row cut [Zheng Yun] first knot cut,? Yin Xue. 【Yangtze Dialect】Leave and rest. [Zuo Si·Dongdu Fu] The horse has more than one foot, and the anger has not vented.　It's leaking again. [Moderation] Vibrate the rivers and seas without leaking.　Removed again. Also used as 渫, detailed 渫 word note.　It's reduced again. [Zuo Zhuan·20th Year of Zhao] To relieve its deficiencies to vent its faults.　The name of the river. [Shuijing Note] Xiexi, Zhuzhao County.　Another last name. [Zuo Zhuan·Xi Seven Years] Zheng Youxie's family.　【Jade articles】The same vent.
